text: khuda pharamaega ki ye vah din hai ki sachche bandon ko unakee sachchaee (aaj) kaam aaegee unake lie (hare bhare behisht ke) vah baagaat hai jinake (darakhto ke) neeche nahare jaaree hain (aur) vah usamen abaadul aabaad tak rahenge khuda unase raazee aur vah khuda se khush yahee bahut badee kaamayaabee hai
